mapper.select: SELECT I.ID, I.NAME, PRICE, CURRENT_STOCK, ORIGIN_STOCK, I.STATUS, BRAND, CATEGORY, REGISTERDATE, UPDATEDATE, I.SAVINGLEVEL_ID, SL.NAME SAVINGLEVELNAME, COUNT(U.ID) COUNT_OF_USER FROM ITEM I LEFT OUTER JOIN SAVINGLEVEL SL ON SL.ID = I.SAVINGLEVEL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ORDERS O ON O.ITEM_ID = I.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN USERS U ON O.USER_ID = U.ID GROUP BY I.ID, I.NAME, PRICE, CURRENT_STOCK, ORIGIN_STOCK, I.STATUS, BRAND, CATEGORY, REGISTERDATE, UPDATEDATE, I.SAVINGLEVEL_ID, SL.NAME
